Nut-Free

NUT-FREE APPLE CINNAMON PROTEIN BARS

A warm and comforting nut-free protein bar with the classic flavors of apple and cinnamon, providing 16g of protein.

16g
Protein
220
Calories
30m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 bar

Carbs26g
Fat9g
Fiber5g
Sugar12g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 180g rolled oats
  • 120g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 120g unsweetened applesauce
  • 1 large egg
  • 60g honey
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1 medium apple, finely chopped

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Preheat oven and prepare pan

Preheat your oven to 175¬∞C (350¬∞F) and line an 8x8 inch pan with parchment paper.

2

Mix ingredients

In a large bowl, combine the rolled oats, protein powder, applesauce, egg, honey, and cinnamon. Mix until well combined.

3

Fold in apple

Gently fold in the chopped apple.

4

Bake

Pour the mixture into the prepared pan and bake for 20 minutes.

5

Cool

Let the bars cool completely in the pan.

6

Cut and store

Cut into 12 bars and store in an airtight container.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
